about_the_game:
You are inside a closed room and you need to use your pistol to pass the challenges in each room, be careful and be quick. Shoot them before they hit you, but also be careful, some of them aren't so easy!

This is a game that involves precision and agility, quickly decide what to do or think well while dodging enemy fire.

Controls are the mouse to control the weapon and shoot and the keyboard to move in order to avoid enemy fire.

There will be 50 different levels in which there will be a progressive difficulty.

With each different room you'll find new challenges, whether it's more enemies or different and dangerous enemies.

  • 50 Levels
  • Relaxing Music
  • Innovative Gameplay
  • Satisfactory Gameplay
  • Funny and Simple

name: Quick Shot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Destroy the robots before they kill you!
